name: DrugMechDB
description: A database of paths that represent the mechanism of action from a drug to a disease in an indication.
full_citation: Gonzalez-Cavazos, A.C., Tanska, A., Mayers, M. et al. DrugMechDB: A Curated Database of Drug Mechanisms. Sci Data 10, 632 (2023).
